name: Bright, Charming and Modern Altbau
description: The rare and much sought-after Altbaus of Berlin is a joy to experience!  These are the grand apartments from before the First World War with high ceilings and Flur leading to every room. Come in and enjoy this unique experience!  All-inclusive pricing, completely flexible cancellation, and no check-in/out restrictions... we travel a lot. Hence, we know what we expect when we are the guests! :) PS: Our price is all-inclusive, with no extra cleaning fees or additional charges!
neighborhood_overview: This is the prime residential area of old West Berlin (American Sector).  Lush trees, clean and well maintained cobblestone roads and footpaths, beautiful apartment blocks splashed with gardens, parks, restaurants and pubs... Big Aldi is just 2 minutes walk away.
host_about:
Hi there! 

I am Prasad, a global mutt! I was born and raised in India and have worked in the USA and Germany (I currently live in Kansas City). 

I love music, books, travel, and capoeira! I am married and have a lovely wife and two sons (one is already a senior in college, and the other a bubbly 6th grader).

name: Enchanting 142m¬≤(1530 ft¬≤)  Loft/Room in F'Hain
description:
Room in a Altbau flat of 142qm=1530ft¬≤ in Friedrichshain , the heart of night life in Berlin (Berghain, Watergate Katerblau at 500m), but quiet with restaurants and bio/flea markets nearby.
Warm heatings, Oak floor, Original Vintage-DDR style, 6 suspension points for Shibari, Yoga Matts, decorated with original art works, Wifi, Dishwasher, Coffee!
Ideal for who wants an amazing stay,
ABSOLUTELY NO PARTY & NO LOUD MUSIC !
For Professional Photo/Video shoots, a different deal must be agreed
neighborhood_overview:
Location: Warschauer strasse (U1 and S-Bahn, U5 Frankfurter Tor) is located in the vibrant area of Friederischein at the edge with Kreuzberg. Very close to the Berlin Wall- East side gallery !
Simon dach strasse is around the corner, as well as the Boxhagener platz bio-food and antiquities market.
The famous night clubs such as Panorama Bar, Berghain, Katerholzig, Club de Visionaire, Watergate are all at walking distance, as well as the Berlin biggest concert Hall- O2.
host_about:
I live in a huge old flat (100% original berliner altbau) and travel a lot for work and holidays.
When I travel you have the chance to rent the all flat for yourself, when I am  here I love to host and meet new people from all over the world.

I am a photographer and a tango dancer. I am very open minded, I have been living and working in Rome, London, Paris, New York.
My girlfriend often helps me in the flat.
We are very calm and quiet and silent, and I like that atmosphere in the flat.
Please only book these rooms if you are able to enter and respect someone's else home and being able to interact with strangers.
Those who are looking only for a cheap accommodation during their crazy weekends in Berlin, please go to a youth hostel.

description:
'RATED EXCELLENT' tripadvisor
'WINNER, Top Vacation Rental, Berlin' (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)
'One of the most popular holiday apartments of the region' (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)


BEST LOCATION (city center near Checkpoint Charlie, most famous sights can be reached by foot), MOST BEAUTIFUL HOUSE OF THE AREA (downtown city landmark of most legendary street, Friedrichstrasse), TOP CONDITION (total restoration 2014), QUIET (no drive through, because pedestrian zone starts 200 meters away).
neighborhood_overview:
THE BEST CENTRAL LOCATION BECAUSE:

most sights are within walking distance: 2 minutes to Checkpoint Charlie (the most famous symbol of the Cold War); Jewish Museum (the most significant example of contemporary architecture) is our immediate neighbor; 15 minutes to Martin Gropius Bau (main showroom); 20 minutes to Potsdamer Platz (most popular attraction of the New Berlin); 15 minutes to the Gendarmenmarkt (one of the most beautiful marketplaces); 30 minutes to the Brandenburg Gate (the symbol of reunification) and the Reichstag (most famous landmark); 30 minutes to the Museum Island (UNESCO World Heritage Site) with: Old Museum, New Museum, Old National Gallery, Bodemuseum and Pergamon Museum. At Hallesches Tor (3 minutes) is the dock for Berlin's most popular boat tour: the bridge tour.

Art, beauty, multicultural

Is the new center of the Berlin art galleries at this point. Here is the line between alternative and multicultural district of Kreuzberg and

In it dozens of different nationalities come together and learn to live side by side with their differences and similarities. To wander around this area is quite an experience. It's streets offer a unique environment, truly worth knowing.
With its typical shops and markets it is another one of the peculiar city areas, both for the ambiance and for the beautiful 19th century architecture of the buildings.
The Bl√ºcher Boardinghouse is specifically located in a privileged area of this Berlin district. Its surroundings house, specially at Bergmannstrasse, Graefestrasse and Dieffenbachstrasse a number of shops, restaurants, cafes, and bars where you can go out for a drink at night.

name: Charming maisonette apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
Charming Maisonette Apartment in the Heart of Prenzlauer Berg
Welcome to our cozy family apartment, located in the most popular district of Berlin: Prenzlauer Berg. This charming maisonette apartment offers the perfect retreat for families who want to explore Berlin while enjoying a quiet yet central location.
neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg, also known as "Prenzlberg," has undergone a remarkable transformation since the reunification, evolving from a trendy district to an affluent family-friendly neighborhood, making it one of the most sought-after areas in Berlin. It has attracted a diverse mix of young professionals, families, and artists. The facades of the historic buildings have been painted in vibrant colors, giving the district and the city a fresh new look. Today, you'll find a plethora of high-quality shops and organic markets, such as the one at Kollwitzplatz, featuring local producers from Berlin and Brandenburg. The area is rich in bustling shopping streets, including Hufelandstra√üe, known for its artistic and deco shops, charming vintage boutiques, delightful vegan restaurants, and the scenic Volkspark Friedrichshain with its beautiful terraces.
host_about:
Hello, we are Thomas and Altea, choreographers for theater and opera, with three daughters, the youngest still living with us. 
We enjoy relaxing and cooking together in our beautiful, spacious apartment, ideal for family life. 
Having lived and worked abroad all our lives, we cherish our neighborhood: Prenzlauer Berg is vibrant, peaceful and safe, with parks, cozy cafes and delicious international eateries. 
Willkommen! Welcome! ¬°Bienvenidos!

name: Industrial Design Studio Ap. in the Heart of MItte
description: Location location location. This Delux Apartment has a perfect location, lying in a part of Mitte that is just close enough to the hotel area but also in a cool street with lots of new cafes and restaurants that makes you feel like a real Berliner. I'm very close to the U6 station, two stations away from Friedrichstrasse, so transportation is easy. The apartment was renovated in 2013 by an architect and furniture were bought in high end shops.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is very trendy, and there's an influx of new restaurants, bars, and other points of interest. This is Mitte, so things are quite central - worth noting is how close Hauptbahnhof is (Berlin's main train station), also the Hamburger Bahnhof, one of the most important modern art museums in the world, is a 10 min walk. Another museum that's a five min walk is Berlin's Natural History Museum.

For eating my favourite places around are Bonfini (an italian restaurant nearby), also Chicago WIlliams BBQ serves an amazing meat menu and is quite near. Nightlife wise I recommend Reingold, which is not far away in novalis strasse, and has a 20's theme - all the waiters and bartenders are dressed like 20s bartenders and the place is lots of fun.
host_about: Besides being a host, I'm also an actor, so I know all about what it's like "behind the scenes" and "In the Limelight". I do everything I possibly can behind the scenes, so that the guest gets the best "show" possible. My guests usually report an nice easy time, because so much energy and love were put into my apartments. I can honestly say I'm proud of my business.

name: Luxury Penthouse, 2 BDR, 2 Baths, AC
description: The penthouse is on the 6th floor with elevator. It has two bedrooms and two fully equipped bathrooms, living room with an open kitchen, a 15sqm terrace,  a free parking spot and air-condition. The apartment is 1,1 km or 15 walking mins south of KDW.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is a quiet residential area. At Prager Platz, ca. 250 meters, you will find three supermarkets, a pharmacy, hairdresser, drugstore and a newspaper stand. There are coffee shops, an Italian, Vietnamese and a Greek restaurant, and several others nearby. A gas station is 390 meters away, just next to the subway station G√ºntzelstrasse.  The famous KaDeWe shopping center is about 15 walking minutes/ 1 kilometre towards the north.
host_about: My life motto is: treat people the way you want to be treated, and do it first. So I like to host people and provide a safe, clean and interesting visit to Berlin. When I am out of town I can also leave the whole apartment for families with children or two couples, for example. My travels have brought me to almost all over Europe, the US, Caribbean, Australia, Asia, Africa and even to the sub polar Region of Russia, where we experienced a chilly -44 Celsius in Yakutsk in January 2008. In my free time I work as a volunteer in care giving for dying people in a Hospice-network in Berlin as well as being an extra in dozens of movies made in Berlin. My biggest "role" was a little scene in "The queens gambit" together with Anya Taylor-Joy.

description: Our spacious, warm, fully-equipped, and extremely well-connected central Berlin apartment offers an oasis of calm and period charm in this exciting and vibrant city. neighborhood_overview: One of the most elegant districts in Berlin, Charlottenburg exudes old-world glamour. Named after Queen Charlotte of Prussia, it is stuffed with French-influenced architecture, stylish and ethnic / street food restaurants and cafes to suit all tastes and budgets, shopping streets, theatres, museums and peaceful parks. The area has always attracted Berliners and tourists, from celebrities, artists, and politicians who haunt the famous Paris Bar, to today's young families who have made the area their home. The iconic Kurf√ºrstendamm - the Champs-Elys√©es of Berlin - runs parallel to Kant Strasse, and there is Charlottenburg Palace, the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial church, Schiller theatre, Deutsche Opera, the list goes on and on.
host_about: Hi, we love Berlin. Although we currently live in Switzerland there is  part of us that is always in Berlin. There is so much history, and so much that is contemporary too. We hope you'll love it a much as we do.

neighborhood_overview: Charlottenburg-Westend is a beautiful and multifaceted neighbourhood with a lot of tradition. You can easily walk to the exhibition grounds, the Olympic Stadium and the lively Theodor-Heuss-Platz. The beer garden on the stadium terraces, the radio tower, the forest stage, the voles, a bowling alley and lots of shops and pubs  as well as snacks and cafes are in the immediate vicinity. Actually, you don't have to leave the neighborhood for everyday errands. If you want to go to the city, you can easily take the bus right outside the door or the metro line 2. If you want to go swimming, one of the best swimming pools in the city awaits you with the swimming pool at the Olympic Stadium. For walks in fresh greenery and along the Spree, the Schlosspark Charlottenburg and the villa area or the beautiful old building district of Westend await. For children there are playgrounds at F√ºrstenplatz.

neighborhood_overview: K√∂penick is the district of Berlin with the largest proportion of green space and the lowest population density. Average life expectancy is highest in the K√∂penick district of Berlin - this speaks for the balance between urban and rural life in K√∂penick, especially Rahnsdorf. At the weekend, many inner cities come to the outskirts of Berlin, such as K√∂penick, to enjoy the outdoors. A bike ride in the countryside, good food and a coffee by the water at the end make a day of relaxation. In the village center of Rahnsdorf there is the last M√ºggelseefischer with fresh offers.

name: Nordic Vibe Rooftop Flat in Neuk√∂lln Schillerkiez
description:
Take the stairway to heaven (100 steps, no lift) and top off your Berlin experience in our luxurious rooftop family apartment in Neuk√∂lln!
Endless light, and elegant, airy interior design featuring a Nordic vibe. Also, there is a huge private terrace perfect for summer.
The apartment is situated in Schillerkiez just on the edge of the magnificent Tempelhof Airfield, with countless nearby supermarkets, bars, caf√©s, and restaurants that have you covered from breakfast to late night snack.
neighborhood_overview: Schillerkiez is part of Neuk√∂lln situated just East of the Tempelhof Airfield. In the past years the gravy train that is Kreuzk√∂lln has extended its reach to this nice little neighborhood. It is characterized by peaceful roads and pre-war tenement houses, which set the stage for a harmonious mix of young families, international alternative lifestyle enterprises, and the organically grown Neuk√∂lln immigrant communities. Many lovely little caf√©s, restaurants and the massive free space of the Airfield Park attract people from all over town, creating a colorful yet relaxed urban vibe.
host_about:
Hei! 
I'm lucky to live with my family in Berlin, where I was also born and raised.
Fortune also had it that I was able to travel extensively and I am still travelling to Finland on a regular basis. Go Suomi! 
I think food is a great way to connect with others - so cooking and making food is a passion of mine
I love being a host, and I always aim to make guests feel they are free to be themselves - simple as that.

Ael: Ich bin auch 7 Jahre alt. Unendlich neugierig auf die Welt. Ich interessiere mich von den kleinsten Tierchen bis zum Weltraumschiff f√ºr alles. Fussballspielen ist das genialste, aber in einen Verein trau ich mich noch nicht. Ich komme in die 2. Klasse der Waldorfschule.

name: beautiful city apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg
description:
Kreuzberg is not only known for its unique charm and the most beautiful parks, but also for the typical Berlin apartments in old buildings.

Our apartment offers through large rooms and high ceilings a lot of space and freedom and immediately gives you the carefree Berlin lifestyle.

For an authentic Berlin stay, our individually designed apartment, in the trendy Bergmannkiez in the heart of Kreuzberg, is the perfect base for your Berlin experience.
neighborhood_overview:
The accommodation is in a relaxed side street, not far from the lively Bergmannkiez.

Besides many great cafes and restaurants, we are surrounded by a lot of nature such as the Viktoria Park, the Hasenheide, the Gleisdreieckpark or the Landwehrkanal.

In these places you can wonderfully relax, exercise your body with jogging or yoga or stroll around leisurely.

For children, our neighborhood is also wonderful - many playgrounds, the outdoor pool "Prinzenbad", an animal enclosure as well as plenty of opportunities to eat ice cream, make children's hearts beat faster.

The connection to the public transport couldn't be better. You have the U7 (Gneisenaustra√üe) right outside the front door, as well as the U6 (Mehringdamm) just a few minutes walk away.

neighborhood_overview: Stepping out, you're met with the bustling charm of Berlin Mitte, an area steeped in rich history and vibrant culture. Morning coffee enthusiasts will relish the plethora of cafes, such as the acclaimed "Caf√© Oberholz", merely a stone's throw away. Food lovers can indulge in the diverse culinary scene, from traditional German fare at "Zur Rose" to more exotic tastes at "Monsieur Vuong". And for those eager to dive deep into the cultural heartbeat of Berlin, iconic sites like the Museum Island and the Berlin Wall Memorial are just a short stroll away. Dive into the captivating blend of historical allure and modern comforts that our Rheinsbergerstr apartment and its surroundings offer.

name: Romantic old horse barn
description: Charming former stable with 1  living room with kitchenette, toilet / shower and 1 bedroom with sleeping accommodation for 5 people: king-size bed, queen-size bed and single sofa bed ; Very good public transport connections to the U5 Frankfurter Allee station (sightseeing line), 10 minutes from Alexanderplatz, 30 minutes to the airport, free parking spaces on the street. Smoking on the entire property (in- and outside) is not welcome.
neighborhood_overview:
I live in the front house. The property is located in a city commercial area, with no other inhabitants in the street but two car repair shops and some storage properties as neighbours.

A side railway line is close by the house and traffic rolls with irregular, slow freight and passenger trains. Great for trainspotting - not recommendable for countryside people used to complete silence.

The surrounding looks the same like East Germany 30 years ago, the buildings are quite raw, unfinished and old. Many street artists have left their marks on the walls in this area. Still it is a safe and especially on weekends at night a lively area, due to several music clubs close by.

If you are looking for a fancy, refurbished area - this is not the place for you. Then I recommend Prenzlauer Berg or Mitte.

If you know Berlin already, if you are open minded and curious, if you want to get deeper into the Berlin feeling, feel and see the raw unfinished and
host_about: Welcome! Each person is unique and brings something special, which is why I‚Äôm thrilled to host guests from around the world. I am a curious, open-minded individual who values family and enjoys caring company. I embrace new experiences and love traveling, knowing how comforting it is to feel welcomed in a new place. My goal is to offer that same warmth and hospitality, ensuring my guests feel at home and well taken care of during their stay.

neighborhood_overview:
Nestled in the vibrant district of Fennpfuhl/Friedrichshain (more specifically, S Storkower Str), our spacios Airbnb is the perfect gateway to Berlin's eclectic culture and history. Just a mere 10-minute stroll from our doorstep, you'll find yourself on Simon-Dach Strasse, an iconic avenue brimming with quirky cafes, unique boutiques, and the pulse of Berlin's nightlife.

But that's not all! Venture a little further, and within a 25-minute walk, you'll reach RAW‚Äîa sprawling cultural complex that's a testament to Berlin's alternative spirit. From edgy art galleries to underground clubs and bustling food markets, RAW is a must-visit for those seeking the authentic Berlin experience.

Book with us and immerse yourself in the soul of Berlin, right in the heart of Friedrichshain! Friedrichshain also has amazing nightlife, small boutique shops, cafes and bars. There is an organic food market every Saturday on Boxhagener Platz.

neighborhood_overview:
The location of the accommodation is ideal for doing business with or without a car in the centre of Berlin or in the northern Berlin countryside. Strong forest and lake landscapes invite you to relaxing trips.
You can reach the Baltic coast in just 2.5 hours, which is ideal for a day trip.
It is also worth a visit to the Prussian gardens in Berlin, Potsdam and Brandenburg. Potsdam can be reached by car via the northern Berlin Ring in about 40 minutes.
With the opening of the Bundesgartenschau in Berlin in 2017, another attraction in the "Gardens of the World" will provide a relaxing stimulus in the neighbouring district.

name: Luxury Altbau in Charlottenburg. Elegant and Quiet
description:
Entire original Berliner Altbau, elegantly decorated with love to the detail, on the 4th floor, full of light, in a quiet courtyard of Charlottenburg. Perfect railway, bus and car access, also walking: many nice restaurants/caf√©s, parks, shops around, Ku'Damm! Full of comforts: multiroom stereo, FullHD projector/cinema, fully equipped kitchen, high speed blender for smoothies, barista machine, washer, dryer, high speed internet, climate.
Ideal for groups, but absolutely NO PARTY/extreme noises.
neighborhood_overview: As the flat is in the heart of Berlin, placed in Charlottenburg near Messe Berlin / trade fair / exhibition trade center, it is very well connected to any public transport like bus (long (ZOB) and short distance, 3 mins to walk), U-Bahn (metro, 4 mins walk), S-Bahn and Fernbahn (train, long and short distance, 5mins walk) and well connected to the main highways (5 mins drive) you can besides very well also just walk around as there are two street markets with fresh food (3 mins by feet), the biggest car-free walking mile of Berlin with many stores (Wilmersdorfer Stra√üe, 4 mins by feet), the famous Kurf√ºrstendamm / KuDamm (7 mins by feet) and some parks with lakes reachable (Tiergarten = 20 mins walk / 3 train stations=9 min - there is also one of the best flee markets of Berlin, Schloss Charlottenburg = 25 mins walk, Lietzenseepark = 15 mins walk), the amazing huge and calm Grunewald (3 train stations = 13 mins) - this is my special secret tip as well as Teufelsberg to really breath in
host_about:
Hello I am Philip, I work as a lawyer in Berlin since many years.

Besides my job I am very interested in art, photography and Tango dancing - Berlin is directly after Buenos Aires the city with the most Tango-dancing opportunities in the world :-)

I like to travel around the world, and I am very happy of meeting people from every culture and country. That is why I started hosting on airbnb to have the opportunity to meet people and to let them staying in my place while I will travel in other countries.

If you want to be adviced about interesting places in Berlin do not hesitate to ask me!

I am very calm and quiet and silent, and I like that atmosphere in the flat.
Please only book my rooms if you are able to enter and respect someone's else home and being able to interact with strangers.

Those who are looking only for a cheap accomodation during their crazy weekends in Berlin, please go to a youth hostel.

neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is located in the trendy district of Prenzlauer Berg. From here, you can take the tram or subway to Alex, Hackenschen H√∂fen, in 15-20 minutes. From there you will be at the Cathedral or Museum Island in about 15-20 minutes. A stone's throw from Museum Island, the Brandenburg Gate is a landmark of Berlin!
Take your time and explore Prenzlauer Berg. Every Saturday there is the famous organic market at Kollwitzplatz. Every Sunday - flea market at Mauerpark. Explore the beautiful cafes, alternative shops, and bars on Prenzlauer Berg's streets. For night owls, there are numerous clubs, bars and cafes in the immediate vicinity . In summer you should definitely visit the beautiful Volkspark Friedrichshain with its lakes, fountains and fairytale fountains.

name: Wundersch√∂ne Ferienwohnung in Berlin-Mahlsdorf
description:
Comfortable apartment in the beautiful district Berlin-Mahlsdorf in a quiet, green residential area on the eastern outskirts of Berlin.

The light-flooded holiday apartment has 72 sqm and is located on the ground floor of a two-storey detached house. With its living room and two bedrooms, it can accommodate up to 5 people. A baby cot is available on request at any time.
neighborhood_overview:
Mahlsdorf is a village and a former municipality in the Marzahn-Hellersdorf district of Berlin, Germany. It was first documented in 1345 as Malterstorp.
Together with Kaulsdorf and Biesdorf, Germany's largest contiguous area with single- and two-family houses is located here.

Nearest shopping is 7 min walk. Restaurants, cafes and bars are also within walking distance.

Sights in the surroundings:
- Gardens of the world with thematic country cultures
- Biesdorf Castle and Palace Park - Wuhletal Hiking Trail - Alt-K√∂penick with the Museum of Arts and Crafts in the

Castle
- Gr√ºnderzeitmuseum in Mahlsdorf with Zillekneipe

The Kaulsdorf lakes - in summer well suited for swimming - can be reached in 10 minutes on foot.
host_about:
Meine Frau Gitti und ich sind beide richtige Berliner Urgesteine. Wir wohnen direkt auf dem Nachbargrundst√ºck und stehen euch somit f√ºr R√ºckfragen jederzeit gern zur Verf√ºgung.

Letztes Jahr haben wir den Entschluss gefasst, die Einliegerwohnung unserer Tochter in eine Ferienwohnung umzugestalten. Nun sind wir mit der Sanierung fertig und freuen uns, euch eine wundersch√∂ne und liebevoll eingerichtete Urlaubsunterkunft anbieten zu k√∂nnen. Wir sind schon ganz gespannt, viele Menschen aus der ganzen Welt kennen zu lernen. 

Unser Hund Fiete, ein blonder Hovawartr√ºde, ist sehr kinderlieb und freut sich ebenfalls auf euren Besuch.

name: Spacious Prenzlauer Berg!
description: Funky and spacious 85m2 apartment in the heart of trendy Prenzlauer Berg, surrounded by shops, restaurants and bars.
neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg is one of the most bustling neighbourhoods in Berlin, with an abundance of shops, bars, cafes and restaurants. It belonged to the former East Berlin, but was one of the first areas to begin gentrification, and is now a great mix of old and new Berlin. There is a supermarket right next door, and plenty of eating options within 1-2 minutes walk. Highlights include an amazing Japanese place 1 minute away, Berlin's best ice cream 3 minutes away, and a little further afield an amazing traditional German restaurant that is off the tourist trail, as well as Berlin's oldest and biggest beer garden. All of the tourist attractions are very easy to get to, and there is a good place nearby to rent bicycles (the best way to get around!).
host_about: I am a classical musician from Melbourne, Australia. I love traveling and do quite a lot of it!

name: Large 2 bedroom apartment in Berlin PrenzlauerBerg
description:
Charming 90 square meters apartment with two bedrooms, two bathrooms, fully equipped kitchen and large living room with dining area.

Since May 2020 the whole apartment is exclusively rented out to one group/family. No sharing with other guests.

This cozy and exclusive apartment is on the first floor of a classical antique building in Berlin.
A quiet and discrete place.
You can experience the original Berliner lifestyle in the cool area of Prenzlauerberg.
neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauerberg is a residential and lifestyle area located central north, 10 minutes away from Alexanderplatz. offer a variety of nice avenue with restaurants, bars and cafes. it's the biggest area in Berlin with resisted the bombs of the war, so the streets and boulevards offer a unique panoramic of original facades from the turning of the 20th Century.
host_about:
Italian based since almost nine years in Germany. I am a PHD designer and I run a small Boutique Hotel in Berlin. I work also in photography, product design and sometimes fashion. I can speak Italian, English and German.
I like to be cosmopolitan and to experience life  at 360¬∞. I love understatement. I like social contact and to discover different colors, habits and cultures. I respect people and identities, I like to be as well respected. I am friendly and chatty but at the same time discrete and laying back. I don't like the stage: it's too much about showing off a kind of ego and not giving space to authenticity and being spontaneous.
I like to enjoy the moment at the best: a great panorama with a glass of white wine after a long hike on the mountains, a piece from Sasha Walz,  set my tent in the wood after a day of kayaking along a sunny river, grilling with friends at the beach, going back to my family and keep in touch with my roots, the scent of a lemon, Stromboli volcano erupting, once in a while a night of good and deep electronic music in Berghain, a smiling hug to the one that I love, the intense blue color of ocean water, some good merino wool garments in winter. the laser-like sound of iced Swedish lakes when nordic walking, the sun, a white villa on a mediterranean island, a massage on my back from expert hands, a film by Peter Greenway with some candles around and children and dogs sleeping, planning a destination with friends, a generous piece of dark orange chocolate before a hard Banja sauna round. freedom.

description:
The newly built TRIO Apartments are located 9 kilometers east of Alexanderplatz amidst the historic flair of listed buildings and offer you the space and comfort for your individual stay in Berlin!
Our 1- to 4-room apartments offer high-end amenities, high functionality and are designed for self-sufficiency.
Supermarkets and facilities for daily needs are within walking distance.
Sights such as Alexanderplatz can be reached by train in 15 minutes.

Sights of Berlin:
Sights such as Alexanderplatz can be reached by train in 15 minutes.

Gastronomic facilities:
"Blackbeards" across from the TRIO. Modern BBQ restaurant in industrial style with brick walls, local meat suppliers and bar.
"Antica Pizzicheria" Marzahner Chaussee 85-87. Closed on Mondays.

Supermarkets:
For your daily grocery shopping you will find several discounters in the immediate vicinity, which are open from Monday to Saturday.

Bike rental:
You can rent a bicycle at the S-Bahn station ‚ÄûS Friedrichsfelde Ost‚Äú.

For children and adults:
The children's play land "Bim & Boom" is in the immediate vicinity and is within walking distance. It is open from Tuesday to Sunday.

At ‚ÄûWellenwerk‚Äú Landsberger Allee 270, 10367 Berlin, you can ride the only artificial surf wave of Berlin. Next door, Germanys' first "Deus Ex Machina Temple" opened the doors of a lifestyle-restaurant, surf shop, and mixo

name: 2 Room Apartment in the Heart of Mitte
description:
Location, Location, location - Corner of chausseestrasse and schwarzkopff strasse, in the heart of Mitte with many restaurants, bars, cafes and places of interest near by. There's a sunny inner courtyard for your use. There's a washing machine and a cordless Dyson vacuum cleaner.

The apartment is very quiet and has everything you need.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is very trendy, and there's an influx of new restaurants, bars, and other points of interest. This is Mitte, so things are quite central - worth noting is how close Hauptbahnhof is (Berlin's main train station), also the Hamburger Bahnhof, one of the most important modern art museums in the world, is a 10 min walk. Another museum that's a five min walk is Berlin's Natural History Museum.

For eating my favourite places around are Bonfini (an italian restaurant nearby), also Chicago WIlliams BBQ serves an amazing meat menu and is quite near. Nightlife wise I recommend Reingold, which is not far away in novalis strasse, and has a 20's theme - all the waiters and bartenders are dressed like 20s bartenders and the place is lots of fun.
host_about: Besides being a host, I'm also an actor, so I know all about what it's like "behind the scenes" and "In the Limelight". I do everything I possibly can behind the scenes, so that the guest gets the best "show" possible. My guests usually report an nice easy time, because so much energy and love were put into my apartments. I can honestly say I'm proud of my business.

name: Mooeve 21 apartment in Berlin
description:
Apartment in a 20s Berlin building that preserves the aroma with its entrance hall, original doors and wooden floors.
The apartment is spacious, bright and cozy. It has, a desk, dining table, sofas and comfortable beds. We provide fresh bedlinen and towels.

It is equipped with high-speed Wi-Fi and to check in online and smart lock system.
We offer luggage lockers located at the same building.
And baby cot on demand.
Noise controllers in common spaces areas of the apartment.
neighborhood_overview:
Friedrichshain is one of the districts of former East Berlin that has changed the most. It is Berlin's new bohemia, managing a firm connection to the old East Germany and a forward-looking, youthful scene.
Culinary delights on market day, a relaxing walk through the Volkspark or a visit to a peninsula.
In the evening, explore the Friedrichshain neighbourhood between Warschauer Stra√üe and Frankfurter Allee with its many bars, caf√©s, and restaurants. Whether you want to enjoy a relaxed meal with friends, sip the coolest cocktails or hit the clubs, this area has it all.

name: L Central Berlin-Kreuzberg, Clean, Cozy, Connected
description:
You will have An Entire stylish Souterrain apartment located in The Heart Berlin, Kreuzberg-Bergmannkiez District. It is well connected and busy all the time, fast to reach all the city attractions. it is where the nightlife is if you like outings. The apartment is clean, cozy with style. The property is registered at Berlin city council, so you can feel safe to rent a legal place.

For stays longer than 8 days please contact me to see if possible.
neighborhood_overview:
The Apartment is located in a great area that is alive all night, its 8 minutes walking to the famous street Bergmannstra√üe in Kreutzberg and 3 Minutes walk to U-Bhf Gneisenaustra√üe train Station & U Mehringdamm Train Station. It is also walking distance from most of the attractions, 2 km to Checkpoint Charly & Berlin Wall crossing the water canal, 3 km to Bradenburg Gate and the Memorial also to the State Park and Bundestag, 2.5 km to Museum Island Berlin, Potsdamer Platz & The Mall of Berlin, also very close to lots of shopping streets & 20 Minutes by underground to the famous Brands street Kurf√ºrstendamm.

It's basically located where things are happening and its where fun & Night Life are.
host_about:
Hi Everyone, 

My name is Yaz & I am from Berlin. However, I lived in Dubai for 20 Years and I was working in real estate & asset management during my stay there.  Untill I decided to move Back to Berlin & here I am hosting people in two entire cozy apartments in the heart of the vibrant city Berlin.

I have traveled to so many countries and meet a lot of interesting people, heard their stories and shared with them mine. I enjoy going out and socializing with others. 

I love cooking and I like to try authentic food from all around the planet, of course with people that make it more enjoyable. 

Here in Berlin, I can advise my guests where to go and what to do, especially in my place they are exactly where things are happening. 

See you soon in Berlin. 

Yaz

name: Beautiful Penthaus near East-Side Gallery
description:
Penthouse on the 5th floor (with elevator). There is a Balcony with direct sunlight all day long and a roof terrace with grate views of Berlin. Even though it is very central you would find it quiet a nice (we are at the second backyard).
The flat is near lines of Tram, Bus, U-Bhan and S-Bahn. Just 15 minutes walk from the East Side Gallery and 5 minutes from Frankfurter Tor. The neighborhood is full of nice restaurants, boutiques, supermarkets, and all you need for a great stay in Berlin
neighborhood_overview: Friedrichshain is one of the most exciting and interesting neighborhoods in Berlin. Once in the DDR there is a lot to discover.
host_about:
Hello, I'm Marcela, I live in Berlin with my husband and my kids.
We love to travel together and discover new places. Normally we would walk a lot on vacation because that is the best way to get "lost" and see new things. We love to use Airbnb because it feels like home and we feel more free to move around and eat what we like. 
We think you have to make always the best of what you've got.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the Neuk√∂lln district of Berlin and is increasingly popular among students and young people.
The alternative subculture of Kreuzberg is slowly expanding into the north of Neuk√∂lln. The closure of Tempelhof Airport and the transformation into Tempelhofer Feld Park made North Neuk√∂lln a trendy district.
It offers international cuisine, cafes, and bars that can be afforded even on a small budget. The clubs in Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain are easily accessible by public transport.
The border area with Kreuzberg near Hermannplatz is now known as "Kreuzk√∂lln".
The neighborhood has good transport links. The underground line U7 leads directly to Kreuzberg, the U8 to Kreuzberg and on to Mitte.
The S-Bahn lines S41 and S42 connect the district with Friedrichshain and Prenzlauer Berg.

name: Familientraum in Friedrichshain / Prenzlberg
description:
Our beautiful duplex apartment on the border of Prenzlauer Berg and Friedrichshain is waiting for you!

Quiet, yet well located. S-Bahn/U-Bahn as well as tram are within walking distance (about 8 minutes). Supermarkets and parks are also nearby.

2 bedrooms, a children's room and a cozy kitchen-living room with balcony leave nothing to be desired. Ideal for families (lots of toys and a nice yard with sandpit and swing) or small groups who want to discover Berlin.
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a very quiet, well-kept new building area with many young families.

In the immediate vicinity there are many supermarkets and in the direction of Friedrichshain (Samaritan neighbourhood, about 10 minutes on foot) there are also very nice cafes and restaurants.

The Boxhagener Platz can be reached in about 20 minutes on foot. There are plenty of bars and restaurants that leave nothing to be desired.

With the S-Bahn and U-Bahn as well as tram connections you can reach Alexanderplatz very quickly, but with ring railway connections you can also take further excursions and very comfortably explore all of Berlin.

description: Our holiday apartment is the entire ground floor of a modern fisherman's house in Berlin-Rahnsdorf. It is located on a large property on the banks of the M√ºggelspree. Our holiday apartment is an ideal place for natural relaxation and exciting experiences in the city of Berlin. It can accommodate up to 5  people. Generous parking. neighborhood_overview:
Our fisherman's house is part of the listed village center of the Old Fisherman's Village Rahnsdorf. It is characterized by its quiet location and its proximity to M√ºggelsee and M√ºggelbergen. The landmark and landmark of Rahnsdorf is the traditional village church. It regularly hosts public concerts.
Directly from the property, you can take a detour to the Gro√üer M√ºggelsee or to the water-rich surroundings. Paddle boats and bicycles are available free of charge. A tour of the tranquil New Venice is also appealing; preferably by boat or SUP board. On request we offer a guided motorboat tour "around the M√ºggelberge" for a fee.
Walk around the corner, the motorcycle ferry invites you to a one-hour round trip on the Spree. And on the shore next door, on the weekends of the season, you can enjoy delicious fish food from our local fisherman.

Just around the corner is an Edeka supermarket, a BioCompany branch is a 10-minute walk along the Hasenheide.
Volkspark Hasenheide with fitness offers, cafe and open-air cinema is also right around the corner.

name: Spacious family-friendly apartment with balcony
description:
Old apartment with wooden floor, high walls and stucco on the ceiling, a small balcony with flowers. There is a bedroom with a huge bed and two nurseries, one has a bed that you need to climb up for, the other one a bed which only to be used by a child only.
In the kitchen there is a large table and six chairs, in the living room there is our beloved sofa bed, on which you can hang out wonderfully.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Prenzlauer Berg between Helmholtzplatz and Kollwitzplatz, both of which are known for their relaxed atmosphere, the weekly foodmarkets, nice play grounds for children and many shops and nice little cafes surrounding them. Lychener Strasse is a street with many restaurants (you could eat food from every continent of the world until the australian restaurant was replaced by a spanish one, but you still have the choice of indian, korean, mexican, french, indonesian, jordanese, japanese, italian, german and spanish food). There are two wine bars, a pool bar (August Fengler) and a music bar (23, sometimes with DJ), and two little supermarkets (Ostkost and plasticfree Der Sache wegen) run by really nice people. The children Mitmach-Museum is close by, also the children theatre ohne Namen.
To find parking lots is difficult and you have to pay for parking. However, from Eberswalder Strasse you can take the Tram or U-Bahn to discover more Berlin discricts such
host_about:

name: Berlin Wannsee Landgut
description: The apartment is ideal for families or friends, pets are also welcome. If you like it quiet and close to nature and yet want to have the cities of Berlin, Potsdam around the corner, this is the place to be. There is a private entrance, terrace and Garden. Living room with kitchen and a double bed. One bedroom upstairs with a single bed as well as a king size bed and oversized duvets. We live next door, so never an access or key issue. We are close to the  train. Griebnitzsee and Wannsee. Free parking.
neighborhood_overview:
In nearby Potsdam-Babelsberg or Berlin-Wannsee there are many restaurants, beer garden on the water etc.

Day guests can cycle along the Wall Trail or go swimming in the Griebnitzsee or take a tour through the surrounding lakes. The Glienicker bridge is not far away, the Wannsee just as little. At the end of the street you will find the old highway bridge and restaurant, as well as several old railway bridges and ruins in the forest.

Also not far: Grunewald, castles and gardens, museums, Wannsee beach, film park Babelsberg, the former border crossing Dreilinden, the old castle Hakeburg, the Stahsdorf lock, etc.

name: Spacious 94sqm 2 balconies in the heart of Berlin
description:
I am renting out my spacious, but cozy 94 sqm appartment in the heart of Berlin while I am working abroad. The flat has a huge sleeping room a small sleeping and working room and huge living room. On top you'll find a small & north huge southern balkony, a bar and a bathtub.

Most sights and central places are within only 15 to 20 mins of distance by public transport. The district around Akazienstr. and Goltzstr. is one of the asked places of the city with plenty of good restaurants and bars.
neighborhood_overview:
On sunday there is a good brunch in the Cafe Gottlob around the corner. All over there a lot of good restaurants in Goltzstr. and Akazienstr.. This area is amjor going-out-for-dinner-area. There is a good pub called "rote beete" and several good, but a bit pricey cocktail bars like "salut" and "the green door". Last one was in the top 100 bars of the world for years.
On the other side there is a little park, a bigger park called "park am Gleisdreick" is just 15 min by walk or three bus stations away. On saturday there is the "Winterfeldmarkt" with a lot organic grocerys and artisan food products.
host_about: Long-term traveller, adventurer, former monk, former consultant and tax advisor, mountaineer, sailor

name: Spacious apartment central Friedrichshain
description: Spacious apartment with all the basics you may need. A real Berlin little home away from the average impersonal tourist apartment. Carefully thought through and decorated with original antique furniture, many plants and original artwork that give the place an extra carisma.
neighborhood_overview: Situated in the district of Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg, this comfy apartment will give you the feeling of living like a real Berliner in the place where everything is happening: Small stores, street markets, parks, children's playgrounds, cafes and restaurants all over the place, live music venues of different sizes, and even clubs are all in walking distance. Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg is without doubt the place where the young and multicultural Berlin actually takes place. If you want to go to main tourist attractions in Mitte, we're also very well connected by tram, sbahn and ubahn. From Alexander Platz, considered the center of Berlin, we're less than 15 min away on the u5 metro line.
host_about:
Studied arts and currently work both in my painting studio and hosting. My partner, Christian, is a musician but also has a live music bar and a restaurant. We have a little girl named Lilith and a second baby girl on the way. We're into arts, music, films, travelling, good reads, unique people, animals, plants and nice food (though veggie towards vegan not an extremist!). Travelled around 30 countries, lived in four, now discovering how exciting family life can also be! Think i can say we are open and friendly, always enthusiastic to get to know new places and people. From hosts or future guests I don't expect much more than respectful open friendliness as thus would be our same approach :) 
We've been called a cocktail family because we are part Spanish, English and German, but can also defend ourselves in French, Portuguese and Italian.

The apartment is located in the middle of the lively, hip and trendy district "Kreuzk√∂lln" actually Neuk√∂lln, but just directly on the border to Kreuzberg. There are countless cool bars, great restaurants and small boutiques and galleries within walking distance.
From Hermannplatz (2 min walk) you have a good railway connection to Mitte, Prenzlauerberg and Charlottenburg (10 - 15 min drive).
The green banks of the Landwehr Canal, which is invigorated on Tuesdays and Fridays by a magnificent grocery market and on Saturdays by a clothing and clothing market, are widely known and popular.
host_about:
I am an architect and I live with my family (husband, 2 children and 2 cats) very close from the apartment.
The flat has been bought, renovated, furnished and decorated by me, in purpose of renting it. It has been finished october 2014.

name: 3-Raum Apartment "Home Base", 81 qm
description:
Whether for you and your family, a trip with friends or with your business colleagues, the 3-room apartment is in any case the optimal setting. It has a spacious living/dining area with a fully-fledged fully equipped kitchen and workspace. The two separate bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms are elegant retreats. The spacious balcony offers enough space for everyone to relax with a view of the countryside.

Available in floors 1 to 5.
neighborhood_overview: Hardly anywhere else in Berlin combines authentic neighbourhood life, the history of the once divided city and the vibrant, cosmopolitan spirit as attractive as in the Mitte district around Invalidenstra√üe. World-class cultural highlights such as the Museum Island or the Natural History Museum can be reached as quickly as the numerous theatre and opera houses. The Berlin Wall Memorial is almost at your doorstep. Discover a variety of bars, restaurants, and breakfast options in the immediate vicinity. Popular attractions within walking distance include Torstra√üe, Oranienburger Stra√üe, Rosenthaler Platz, and Hackesche Markt. Numerous ministries, corporations, agencies and institutions are in this dynamic environment, as is the Charit√© campus.
host_about: Die Downtown Apartments bieten 27 vollst√§ndig ausgestattete Serviced Apartments: vom 36 qm gro√üen Studio √ºber gro√üz√ºgige Wohnungen mit zwei Schlafzimmern und zwei B√§dern bis zum 147 qm weiten Penthouse mit zwei traumhaften Terrassen. Jedes Apartment verf√ºgt √ºber eine Loggia oder eine Terrasse ‚Äì mit Blick ins Gr√ºne und Sichtachsen bis zum Fernsehturm am Alexanderplatz. Geeignet f√ºr Kurzaufenthalte ab 2 N√§chten oder Langzeitaufenthalte f√ºr bis zu 6 Monate.

name: Park view in the heart of Berlin.
description: The 100 m2 Berlin-style apartment was renovated in 2013 for its owners, who live there with their two children outside of their vacation. A spacious open kitchen, a loggia with park view and large rooms connected by double doors create an open and pleasant living environment. The apartment includes a bedroom with a double bed, two children's rooms, a bathroom with a bathtub and a guest bathroom with a shower.
neighborhood_overview:
Relax in the shade of old trees and quickly get to Alexanderplatz, Museumsinsel, Mitte, Friedrichshain or Prenzlauer Berg. Stroll through the weekly market on Kollwitzplatz, admire works of art on Museum Island, go up the television tower on Alexanderplatz or immerse yourself in the alternative scene Friedrichshain and the hip scene of Mitte.
Created on the occasion of the centennial of Frederick the Great's ascension to the Prussian throne, today it reflects Berlin's history and modern life. A bronze bust of Frederick II, the M√§rchenbrunnen (‚Äûfountain of fairytales‚Äú) and two small artificial mountains out of rubble from the bombed-out city coexist with playgrounds, tennis courts, a skatepark, a beer garden and a Japanese Pavillon with a Peace Bell.
The B√∂tzowviertel is a calm and family-friendly district with an excellent location, multiple playgrounds, various restaurants and cafes.
host_about: Home is where the heart is and I am in love with so many places.  Currently home is Berlin where I live with my husband and two children. My job is making people love their homes even more, and I try to play jazz piano, sometimes more sometimes less successfully.  I cry while seeing something beautiful or while listening to a good story, or a song. When it happens, feel free to ignore me or simply join in.

Whether for business, with friends or family ‚Äì the spacious 3-room apartment offers enough space with its two bedrooms and 2 bathrooms! The large dining table in the living area offers enough space for a social game evening or a delicious dinner in a cozy atmosphere. Two balconies offer you the freedom to prepare your stay in the fresh air according to the sun.

The apartment is on the 5th floor.
neighborhood_overview: The quiet location on Gerichtstra√üe is ideal to succumb to the proverbial rough charm of Berlin. In the immediate vicinity you can experience the vibrant neighbourhood with multicultural flair, snacks, takeaways and the rapid change of this environment: Seriousness is one of the most uncompromising restaurants in the metropolis. It holds twelve seats and is cooked exclusively with ingredients from the region. A few steps further, you can choose between cultural events and coffee specialities in the historic Silent Green. The Basalt Bar serves perfectly blended drinks and cocktails.

description:
Newly renovated furnished apartment for couples, families or shared flats. The apartment has 2 separate bedrooms of the same size. Each with a double bed. The 3rd room is a living room with access to the kitchen.

Some highlights:
* Tasteful, modern d√©cor
* Large balcony
* Fast wifi
* Shower AND a bathtub
* Nice neighbors and open-minded landlords who care
* Basic household items (washing machine, fridge, toaster, ironing set, etc.) available
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the Wei√üensee district. There is a tram stop right outside the door that will take you to Mitte or the Ringbahn. There are many supermarkets and restaurants in the immediate vicinity and the Prenzlauer Berg with its parks and nightlife is only 20 minutes away on foot. Also the actual Weissensee is only a few minutes away on foot.

neighborhood_overview:
The location: The "Birken Kiez", one of the best kept secrets of Berlin - Mitte, is less than 15 minutes by bus from the main train station. From here everything is within easy reach: the West Center, Zoologischer Garten, can be reached by three subway stations (U9). Tiergarten and its Victory Column: 10 minutes by bike. The trendy neighborhoods of the east, such as Prenzlauer Berg: 15 minutes by public transport. And for those The atmosphere of this quiet corner in the center of Berlin is extremely relaxed, with cozy restaurants and bars just around the corner, and despite its central location very authentic, with predominantly real Berliners. Just around the corner you have a true gem of the neighborhood: the Arminius Markthalle, a historic market hall where you can test out a different kitchen every day, have a beer or buy fresh vegetables for your home cooking.

1.6 km away
Rated with 5.0

Dive deep into Berlin's rich history, revel in its contemporary arts, and then retreat to your private Kreuzberg nest, where memories await to be made.

name: special vibe neuk√∂lln home
description:
it a little, sweet, cosy place. good to work, chill, and be creative and inspired at. it has typical raw berlin walls and wooden floors, high walls, old double windows. very charming. good spirited. selfmade renovation, so very individual. fleemarket and vintage furniture.
Sleepingroom doors and bathroom door are not lockable with a key. Just shut normally.
The fridge in the picture has been replaced with a smaller one, half the size and with a small freezing drawer.
neighborhood_overview: multicultural scenerie, not yet gentrified, so still a raw jewel, some might describe it as a little rough neibourghood, but i ve never experienced danger or discomfort. on the contrary, neighbours are helpful and friendly. lots of sp√§tis, litte late night drink and snack shops, turkish and Arabic markets and food. some cute parks closeby.
host_about: I work as dancer and dance teacher in Berlin and like to enjoy the city with all it's cultural opportunities. I love to socialize and meet friends and new people because exchange is what makes life worth living and exciting. I like to have coffee in one of the many caf√©s in the kiez and get inspired by the people walking by and the things happening in the city. name: Bungalow SUNNY in an idyllic Berlin location
description: Lean back and relax in my Berlin hideway, which last renovated in 2021 and personally furnished by me and an interior designer. Enjoy your retreat after an intensive day of visiting the metropolis.
neighborhood_overview: The ground-level bungalow (one step 7,8 inch at the entrance) is in the rear of a 700 sqm plot of land surrounded by well-tended gardens. Grocery shops and a few Restaurants are within in walking distance (see my travel guide). From there you can reach Alexanderplatz in 35 minutes by public transport. The picturesque waterfront of the old town of K√∂penick is only a 15-minute trip away by bike and offers large selection of Restaurants and Bars. Two bicycles are at your disposal to ease your groceries in the vicinity, so that you can get around easily without a car. Enjoy the hideaway in a landscape protection area after a strenuous day visiting the metropolis. The Ulmen-playground just around the street corner offers fun for kids of all ages with climbing frames, swings, slides, a soccer field, table tennis, balancing course, picnic areas and benches. An evening walk on the nearby Wuhle hiking trail ensures relaxation; with a little luck you might even spot a beaver on the river bank.

There is tourist potential next to the landmarks of the former districts, Sch√∂nhausen Castle in Pankow, the water tower in Prenzlauer Berg and the lake with fountain in Wei√üensee in many ways. neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to the vibrant neighborhood of Wedding/Gesundbrunnen! This area is characterized by its diversity, cultural atmosphere, and excellent transport connections. Just a 3-minute walk away, you'll find subway and bus stops, making it easy to explore Berlin.

Wedding is renowned for its multicultural community, trendy cafes, and restaurants. It offers a mix of historical architecture and modern facilities. The U-Bahn lines U6 and U9, along with various buses, provide convenient access to major attractions and neighborhoods.

The area boasts diverse shopping opportunities, ranging from small boutiques to supermarkets, as well as cozy bars and local markets. The nearby Gesundbrunnen Center offers a wide range of shops and services.

Enjoy the lively atmosphere of this emerging neighborhood and explore Berlin comfortably from your centrally located base.

Seit 17 Jahren lebe ich in dieser wunderbaren, lebendigen, sich st√§ndig ver√§ndernden kurz und knapp gro√üartigen Stadt. 
Zum Studium zog mich Berlin magisch an. Dann bin ich geblieben. Mit vielen Unterbrechungen, um die Welt zu entdecken. Zu Reisen, Menschen kennenzulernen,  neue Welten und M√∂glichkeiten zu entdecken‚Ä¶.das ist meine gro√üe Leidenschaft. 
Mittlerweile teile ich diese Leidenschaft mit meiner Familie, zu der meine drei gro√üartigen und reiselustigen Kinder geh√∂ren.
So habe ich diese unglaubliche Stadt aus so vielen unterschiedlichen Blickwinkeln betrachtet-das kunterbunte aufregende Studentenleben, der Einstieg ins Berufsleben und nun mit Familie. name: Blueground | Mitte, near Potsdamer Platz
description: Show up and start living from day one in Berlin with this stylish three bedroom Blueground apartment. You‚Äôll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped Mitte home with stunning balcony views over the city. (ID #BER42)
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Mitte, Berlin's first and most central district. The area is incredibly rich in history, with many of the city's museums and tourist sites located within the neighborhood. Bustling Mitte is one of the city's key business districts, and there is a diverse restaurant scene with options at all price points. You can splash out at a high-end restaurant like Schnitzelei Mitte, or head to trendy Hackescher Markt, where cafes and shops are located within a series of labyrinthine courtyards. Mitte is also wonderful for sightseeing: the Brandenburg Gate and Museum Island are both located within the neighborhood. Other highlights include the famous Checkpoint Charlie, Tiergarten Park and the Berlin Zoo. There‚Äôs also the historic Tiergarten, one of Germany‚Äôs largest public parks and the perfect place for a dose of nature. Another point of interest is Moabit, formerly an important border between East and West Berlin. Berlin's central train station is located i
host_about:
We‚Äôre Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you‚Äôll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want ‚Äî a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities ‚Äì making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you‚Äôll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative ‚Äî a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you‚Äôll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You‚Äôll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We‚Äôll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: 86sqm penthouse, near Berlin centre & PrenzlBerg
description: 3-room attic flat newly built in 2022 with terrace. Fully equipped with a modern kitchen, full bath,  2 bedrooms & a spacious living/dining area with a comfortable sofa bed; suitable for 5 people, elevator. Ring train & tram connection, close to the S-Bahn station Greifswalder Str. (Prenzlauer Berg), in 20 minutes in the city centre. The neighbouring Langhansstra√üe is a real gastronomic mile, there is also a cinema, organic and weekly market. Very fast & free Wi-Fi.
neighborhood_overview:
The quiet residential area Wei√üensee extends around the lake of the same name, which attracts numerous bathers in summer with the Wei√üensee lido. The Brecht House, where film screenings and literary events take place, and the Milchh√§uschen, a caf√© from GDR times, are located directly on the lake.

The apartment is located in an apartment building in Berlin-Wei√üensee that was completely renovated in 2022. It is located in the center of Wei√üensee, near Antonplatz.

The main traffic axis in Wei√üensee is the Berliner Allee. From here you can quickly get to the Berliner Ring. Roelckestrasse runs parallel to this.

Various shops are within walking distance (EDEKA, organic market, Rossmann and other shops for everyday needs). The weekly market on Antonplatz invites you to stroll and linger.

A variety of great restaurants such as the Moon Cuisine Wei√üensee (Asian cuisine), Fellini Pizza (pizzeria) or the PastaShop (homemade pasta) complete the culinary

Welcome in our home in beautiful Prenzlauer Berg - perfect for a couple or a family.

neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg in a lovely neighborhood that is green and very safe day and night. You find everything you need 5-10 Min. walking distance from our doorstep.
host_about:
Hello fellow travel lovers,

As a host I like to make people feel comfortable while staying at our place. Berlin has a thousands things to offer everyday and I'm happy to help you experiencing some hidden treasures like nice bars, special restaurants, hip flee markets and parties in Berlin. Just let me know what you're up to and I'm sure we'll find something cool.

I absolutely love traveling and experiencing other places and cultures. I've lived in England for 7 months after finishing school and studied 6 month in Bali. Short trips to Copenhagen, Istanbul, Madrid or Prague make my year memorable. During the winter I love to go for a couple of months to Thailand to enjoy some sun.

name: 2 Charming Private Rooms in a Central Apartment
description: Enjoy life in this centrally located yet quiet accommodation, whether it's for a short city trip or if you're here for work. You'll be quickly accessible to the main attractions. An office corner, a small living area, beautiful parks, Alexanderplatz, and great restaurants, as well as easily reachable sights, make it the perfect place to stay.
neighborhood_overview:
Strau√überger Platz is located in the Friedrichshain district of Berlin and is a central place with a vibrant environment. In the immediate vicinity, there are many restaurants, cafes, and bars where you can enjoy a variety of culinary offerings. The area is also known for its exciting nightlife, with numerous clubs and venues popular for their live music and DJ sets.

Furthermore, the surroundings of Strau√überger Platz offer a blend of historical and modern architecture. Here, you will find beautiful old buildings as well as modern residential and commercial structures. Nearby, you can find some of Berlin's most famous landmarks, such as Alexanderplatz and the East Side Gallery, a preserved section of the Berlin Wall adorned with many graffiti artworks.

The area also provides green oases for relaxation, such as Volkspark Friedrichshain, one of Berlin's oldest parks. Here, you can go for walks, jog, or simply enjoy nature. Strau√überger Platz is well-connected to pub
host_about:
Hi ich bin der Christian, aktuell 34 Jahre alt und wohne in Berlin, wenn wir nicht gerade mit unserem Camper durch die gegen flitzen oder auf Reisen sind.

Da ich selbst gerne mit meiner Frau reise und wir viel unterwegs sind, finden wir es super spannend solche tollen Erlebnisse f√ºr andere bieten zu k√∂nnen. Wir sind vielleicht noch an vielen Dingen am Lernen und es mag nicht immer perfekt sein, aber f√ºr Feedback und Vorschl√§ge sind wir immer zu haben und teilen diese auf unseren Trips auch immer gerne :)

Meine Frau urspr√ºnglich aus Lettland und ich aus dem beschaulichen Brandenburg, leben wir jetzt gemeinsam in Berlin und finden die Orte um Berlin in Brandenburg super.

Da wir viel auch in der ganzen welt unterwegs sind, kann es nat√ºrlich auch mal sein dass ich nicht immer sofort dran bin wenn es doch mal etwas zum Austauschen gibt. Genau deswegen habe ich zum Gl√ºck ja alles super f√ºr dich/euch automatisiert, sodass du dich mega wohlf√ºhlen kannst und eine tolle Zeit hast.

Ansonsten sind wir gerne mit dem Rad unterwegs oder einfach sch√∂n entspannt zu Fu√ü Wandern in der Natur. 

F√ºr jegliche Anregungen und Feedback sind wir sehr offen und w√ºrden uns freuen mit euch in Kontakt zu treten, wenn wir helfen k√∂nnen. Oft vermutlich aus der Ferne, da wir ja selbst viel unterwegs sind.

name: Feeling at home in Kreuzberg
description:
Welcome to our charming vacation apartment in the heart of Berlin!

We offer a spacious and cozy accommodation (Loft) that is suitable for up to five people. The apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood where you will feel right at home.

At the same time, you are very central. Numerous attractions, such as Potsdamer Platz or the Brandenburg Gate, can be reached on foot. You also have very good public transportation connections.
neighborhood_overview: The loft is located on the ground floor of a multi-family house in a quiet and central location. In front of the loft, there is a green area with a children's playground. There is a small park and several cafes, as well as a convenience store (Sp√§ti), directly in front of the house. The U-Bahn station U Mendelssohn-Bartholdy-Park is only two minutes away. Potsdamer Platz can be reached in about 7 minutes, and the Gleisdreieck Park with many sports facilities is only 5 minutes away.

name: 6-room old building apartment with garden & 2 cats
description:
Our cozy old building apartment is located on a quiet side street in Tempelhof. It is on the ground floor with a front garden and terrace. 150 square meters with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, living and dining area. One bedroom is in the basement.

ATTENTION: There are 2 cats in the apartment, NOT suitable for people with allergies!
neighborhood_overview:
Tempelhof is not only known for its airport (now a huge recreational area for families and athletes), the air bridge or from Panem tribute. It is a rather quieter, family district with a mixed audience, beautiful old building roads, a shopping center right at the tranquil Tempelhofer Hafen am Teltowkanal.

Here you can find everything in a maximum of 500 m radius, great playgrounds, shopping as well as the U6, which takes you in 10 minutes to Kreuzberg or in 15 minutes directly to the Checkpoint Charlie.

Across the street is NUSZ with great deals on offerings for families, children and a lot of entertainment with theaters, children's farm and the nice Caf√© Rudi & Rosa.

The S√ºdgel√§nde Nature Park or Britzer Garten is only 10-20 minutes by bus, if you want to relax in the countryside in good weather.
host_about: Hi, ich bin Laura und wohne seit 10 Jahren im ruhigen S√ºden Berlins. Wir sind eine f√ºnfk√∂pfige Patchwork Familie mit 2 fluffigen Katzen. Ich liebe es zu reisen, allein, mit meiner Mutter, Freunden oder gleich mit dem gesamten Ratpack. Ich liebe B√ºcher, Podcasts, spiele Saxophon und gehe gern zum Sport. Ob tanzen, Crossfit oder Schwimmen.

name: Rockchair | LANG Li - Cozy Family & Business 2 BR
neighborhood_overview: Quaint Sch√∂neberger Kiez just around the corner, you immerse yourself in a cozy coffee house atmosphere in the Crelle neighborhood, centrally a place with a playground next door - just as the Berliner loves and appreciates it. Down the road you come to the intersection Kleistpark, where David Bowie once lived. Via the Monuments Bridge, one gradually reaches Kreuzberg, a district of alternative lifestyle known beyond Berlin's borders, which has partly preserved its face to this day and, despite its location as a core district, exudes a serenity and diversity that are unthinkable in the neighboring center. Parks and paths have formed along the S-Bahn lines that reveal the most interesting sights in Berlin if you want to experience more than the Brandenburg Gate and the TV Tower...

name: Dachwohnung mit weitem Blick
description: This place is all glass, sunlight and wide vistas which are rare in Berlin. You can enjoy the sunset both from the living room area and the roof terrace which also has a side facing East with a sitting area for breakfast. The apartment is both modern and cosy, with wooden heated floors. Due to its high-standard windows you will not hear any noise of the city while you watch trains passing by directly from the kitchen table - kids love it!
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood with its car-free cobble street and adjacent parks is very popular with young families. Just around the block is beautiful Victoria park with the iconic Kreuzberg which offers a beautiful view over the city. Bergmannkiez and Sch√∂neberg with their many cosy caf√©s and little shops are within walking distance.

name: 2BR Apartment, Parking, Wi-Fi, TV in Berlin Karow
description:
Welcome to my cozy 2-room apartment in Berlin Karow (Pankow).
The ideal location, just about 5 minutes to the highway and a 5-minute walk to the "Berlin Karow" S-Bahn station, makes your journey effortless, including parking right in front of the house.
Equipped with 5 high-quality box spring beds (including bed linen and towels), a fully equipped kitchen, fast Wi-Fi, two 50" 4K TVs, and a washer-dryer, this apartment offers a comfortable short to medium-term stay in Berlin.
neighborhood_overview:
Nestled in the northeastern outskirts of vibrant Berlin, Karow offers a serene escape while maintaining easy access to urban allure. This charming residential district boasts tree-lined streets, welcoming parks, and a sense of community that envelops visitors and residents alike. Karow's peaceful ambiance is complemented by its well-connected transportation network, with the "Berlin Karow" S-Bahn station linking it to the city's heart.

Life in Karow strikes a balance between tranquility and convenience. Enjoy leisurely strolls through local markets and boutiques, or take in the beauty of the lush greenery in Karow Park. With its distinct blend of local charm and modern amenities, Berlin Karow invites you to savor the best of both worlds, where urban exploration meets a peaceful retreat.

Within a maximum of 5 minutes on foot, you can reach:
- S-Bahn station "Berlin-Karow" (you will reach Central Berlin (Brandenburg Gate / Friedrichstrasse) within 25 Minutes wi

name: Lohmeyer 13 Vorderhaus rechts
description: Nestled in the chic neighborhood of Charlottenburg, our spacious 80 sqm apartment offers the perfect retreat for families seeking a blend of comfort and style. As you step into this serene haven, the warmth of natural light illuminates the open-plan kitchen and living room, creating an inviting space to gather, cook, and relax. The two well-appointed bedrooms exude calmness, ensuring restful nights for every member of the family.
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is located in the vibrant district of Charlottenburg, known for its cultural diversity and lively atmosphere. Within walking distance, you will find a range of excellent restaurants and cafes. Try the international specialties at the "Dicke Wirtin" restaurant or enjoy a cozy afternoon at the popular "Caf√© Bleibtreu." Culture enthusiasts will be delighted by the proximity to the Deutsche Oper and the impressive Charlottenburg Palace, where you can immerse yourself in the history and culture of the city. Whether you are interested in art, gastronomy, or simply experiencing Berlin, our apartment is the perfect starting point for your explorations

Absolutely non smoking apartment. Also forbidden to smoke in the backyard asnd outside in front of the property.
host_about:
Hi guys, my name is Marie-Christine from Paris. Me and my husband love Berlin like our second home and we travel there many times a year. Every time our apartment is vacant we decide to rent it to nice guests from all over the world via Airbnb. We are happy to welcome you in our place as long as you treat it with respect and travel and live like a local. 

Good friends of us from Berlin who run a holiday apartment operations help us organize the check in and the cleaning, so if you book our place they will contact you in our name and help you at sight with all your needs.

name: Artist Studio in Berlin Mitte - live & work space
description: My spacious and loved atelier place is located in the heart of Berlin Mitte. It is surrounded by cafes, shops and galleries. It is lovingly planned and furnished to its detail. Beside the  living area in the main room it also has a lot of working areas. The way to metro, bus and tram stations is short. Restaurants, super markets and museums are close by. We do have an elevator.
neighborhood_overview:
This atelier is located in the heart of the old eastern part of Berlin Mitte. It combines the charme of an old building with a spacious atelier that has a combination of vintage and modern furniture.

The way to several metro, bus and tram stations is very short. You find restaurants, super markets, galleries and museums close by. It has beautiful small shopping streets close by located in the well known area of Berlin called "Mitte".

There is a wide range of restaurants available with different directions and price ranges.

Beside the huge working desk in the kitchen area you have also a beautiful cement working desk in the living room.

The dining room has a big dining table.

You find also a dish washer and washing machine in the apartment.

The combination designer and vintage furniture makes this atelier very special. But also their pleasantly location in the center of Berlin is a good for exploring the city.

In this stylishly furnished industrial loft, you are situated extremely centrally in Berlin and can explore the city. The apartment is not only beautiful but also well-equipped:

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to the pulsating heart of Berlin - the charming Prenzlauer Berg! This unique district combines the charm of the past with the energy of the present. Stroll along cobblestone streets lined with historic buildings, quaint cafes and trendy boutiques. Prenzlauer Berg is a creative melting pot where art, culture and joie de vivre meet.

Enjoy the lively hustle and bustle at the Mauerpark flea market, experience a rich culinary offering in the international restaurants or relax in the green oases like Kollwitzplatz. Family-friendly yet lively, this district offers playgrounds, idyllic bookstores and a variety of recreational opportunities.

Dive into the vibrant nightlife and cultural scene: from cozy pubs to hip clubs, there's something for everyone. Your perfect retreat in this dynamic neighborhood awaits you in my accommodation. Here you can experience authentic Berlin life up close. Book now and immerse yourself in the unmistakable flair of Prenzlauer Berg!
